import{Row,Col}from"antd";import React from"react";import{Card}from'antd';import Image1 from"../../assets/images/cc.png";import Image2 from"../../assets/images/python.svg";import Image3 from"../../assets/images/flutterjpg.jpg";import Image4 from"../../assets/images/java.jpg";import Image5 from"../../assets/images/react.png";import Image6 from"../../assets/images/JavaScript.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const{Meta}=Card;function AppFeature(){// Resimler ve açıklamaları bir liste içinde tanımla
const features=[{image:Image1,title:"C",description:"C programlama dili"},{image:Image3,title:"Flutter",description:"Flutter framework"},{image:Image2,title:"Python",description:"Python programlama dili"},{image:Image4,title:"Java",description:"Java programlama dili"},{image:Image5,title:"React",description:"Python programlama dili"},{image:Image6,title:"JavaScript",description:"Python programlama dili"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"feature",className:"block featureBlock bgGray",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-skills",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Skills"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{gutter:[40,24],children:features.map((feature,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{span:8,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{className:"cardfeature",hoverable:true,bordered:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'center',alignItems:'center',flexDirection:'column',height:'50%'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:feature.title,src:feature.image,style:{width:'70%',height:'150px',objectFit:'cover'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{position:'absolute',bottom:'0',width:'100%',color:'white',padding:'4px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Meta,{title:feature.title})})]})})},index))})]})});}export default AppFeature;
